Posts.Content: Hi all. I was just wondering if anyone could help. Before being diagnosed with breast cancer i had booked and paid for a trip to florida. I have had chemo and will be starting radio the end of this month. My treatment will finish 22nd aug and trip not till 11th oct. Has anyone done this and if so how was you. Thanks x
Posts.Title: Travelling abroad

Posts.Content: I havent really looked at travel insurance but i suppose speaking to macmillian servicea maybe they could help us to find the right level of cover. Hopefully we with both get away and have a great time. We all need the break hey. Xx
Posts.Title: Travelling abroad

Posts.Content: Thanks so much for replying. I was just a bit worried as its a long haul flight. We need a break for everything we have been through. I am sure there wouldnt be a problem but will double check. Thanks again its put my mind at ease xx
Posts.Title: Travelling abroad

Posts.Content: Thanks so much for reply. I have finished all chemo and will have finished radio approx 7wjs before travelling. But will definitely speak to my oncologist about it. Xx
Posts.Title: Travelling abroad

Posts.Content: Thanks for reply. I will look into having an aspirin and stockings to help with the journey. Hopefully i will get the all clear to travel. Best wishes to you xÂ
